com.mlt.desktop.control

Class TaskPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.ScrollPane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.TaskPane

  • public class TaskPane
extends ScrollPane
    A panel aimed to monitor the progress of a set of tasks.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
